articles.description: After a long wait, Facebook finally rolled out disappearing messages feature for Android, iOS, web and desktop platforms. The feature automatically deletes any given message after seven days of sending it. Disappearing messages feature will be available for i…

articles.title: From '123456' to 'iloveyou', here are the 20 worst passwords of 2020. Is your password on the list? - Times Now
articles.description: "Is my password strong enough?" Have you ever asked yourself this question? Check out the list of 20 worst passwords of 2020 to find out if your password is secure:
articles.content: Setting passwords that are easy to remember is something that we all do. But the passwords should not be easy for hackers. Passwords such as '123456' and 'iloveyou' are easy to crack. Authorities rem… [+1813 chars]

articles.title: These Oppo smartphone have got cheaper by up to Rs 2,000 - Gadgets Now
articles.description: NEW DELHI: Oppo has slashed prices of variants of Oppo A12, Oppo A15, Oppo F17 and Oppo Reno 3 Pro. The handsets have got a price cut of up to Rs 2,000. As per a tweet shared by Mahesh Telecom, Oppo A12 with 3GB RAM and 32GB storage will retail at Rs 8,990 no…

articles.author: Alan Friedman
articles.title: Thanks to Nvidia's cloud streaming platform, Fortnite is returning to iOS - PhoneArena
articles.description: While popular game Fortnite is no longer available from the App Store and iOS, it will soon be available via Nvidia's GeForce NOW cloud gaming platform using the Safari mobile browser.
